name: Google Ads Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Ads Tool 节点。主要用于: Use the Google Ads API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Use the Google Ads API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: campaign

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many campaigns linked to the specified account
Get (值: get) - Get a specific campaign

campaigsNotice.displayName: Divide field names expressed with micros by 1,000,000 to get the actual value
campaigsNotice.name: campaigsNotice
campaigsNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Divide field names expressed with micros by 1,000,000 to get the actual value

managerCustomerId.name: managerCustomerId
managerCustomerId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Manager Customer ID | (必填项)

clientCustomerId.name: clientCustomerId
clientCustomerId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Client Customer ID | (必填项)

campaignId.name: campaignId
campaignId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Campaign ID | 作用: ID of the campaign | (必填项)

additionalOptions.name: additionalOptions
additionalOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Options | 作用: Additional options for fetching campaigns | 默认值: {}
available_options: dateRange (值: None) - Filters statistics by period
campaignStatus (值: None) - Filters campaigns by status

requestOptions.name: requestOptions
requestOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Request Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: allowUnauthorizedCerts (值: None) - Whether to accept the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible
proxy (值: None) - HTTP proxy to use. If authentication is required it can be defined as follow: http://username:password@myproxy:3128
timeout (值: None) - Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request
